Title: Establishes a state youth commission to advise the governor on youth issues in the state of New York
Summary: Establishes a state youth commission to advise the governor on youth issues in the state of New York, including juvenile crime prevention, job opportunities for youth, recreational activities for teenagers, opportunities for effective participation by youth in the governmental process, and changes in city and county regulations that are necessary to improve the social, economic, educational, and recreational advantages of children and youth.
LawCode: Add Art 19-J ยง535, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing a state youth commission to advise the governor on youth issues in the state of New York
